# lcod://tooling/value/is_defined@0.1.0

Check whether a value is defined (not null or undefined).

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | any | No | Value to inspect. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `ok` | boolean | True when the value is defined. |

## Notes

Returns whether the provided value is defined (i.e. neither `null` nor
`undefined`).
